subject: Baseball
Memorabilia
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, Sept. 17 (AP) — The fate of Barry Bonds’s record-breaking home run ball is now in the public’s hands after its buyer announced Monday that he was taking votes on whether to give the ball to the Hall of Fame, brand it with an asterisk or blast it into space.
